statements: SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT product_name, available_quantity FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 1001
SELECT product_name, available_quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY available_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'Apple%'
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM inventory
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, available_quantity FROM inventory WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE available_quantity > 10 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory WHERE available_quantity < 5 OR available_quantity > 20;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM inventory;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity FROM products ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity_ordered FROM orders ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity >= 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_quantity, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 5 OR price > 50 ORDER BY stock_quantity ASC, price DESC;

SELECT product_id, product_name, orders.order_id, order_date FROM products INNER JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE orders.quantity_ordered > 10 ORDER BY products.product_name ASC, orders.order_date DESC;

SELECT orders.order_id, products.product_name, orders.quantity_ordered, orders.order_date FROM orders INNER JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE orders.quantity_ordered >= 5 ORDER BY orders.order_date ASC, products.product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, available_quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY available_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, order_date FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, available_quantity, last_updated FROM inventory WHERE available_quantity > 0 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;

SELECT orders.order_id, products.product_name, orders.quantity, orders.order_date FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE products.quantity >= orders.quantity ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC, inventory_level ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE inventory_level > 50 ORDER BY product_name
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE LENGTH(email) > 0
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 5 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT product_id, update_type, update_date FROM inventory_updates WHERE update_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, shipping_address FROM shipments;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity < 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY supplier_address;
SELECT order_id, product_id, supplier_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY order_id;
SELECT shipment_id, order_id, shipping_address, shipment_date FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date >= '2021-07-01' ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
